icon_quick_bookmark_disabled.message: L'icône de marquage rapide est désactivée

welcome_configure.message: Merci de prendre quelques instants pour la configurer selon vos préférences.

welcome_message_display.message: Ce message ne s'affichera qu'une seule fois.

options_changelog_210_list_1.message: Fix: Tab drag and drop bookmarking and "Marquer tous les onglets..." features are now excluded from the overriding and behave normally (GitHub issue #5)

options_changelog_210_list_2.message: New: Select the color of the quick bookmark icon (among a list) when the current page is bookmarked

options_changelog_210_list_3.message: New: Higher quality quick bookmark icons

options_changelog_210_list_4.message: New: Release notes tab in the options<

options_changelog_211_list_1.message: Fix: The built-in shortcut and context menu bookmarking now use the defined location on Firefox stable version 57.x (GitHub issues #7 and #9)

options_changelog_212_list_1.message: Fix: The built-in bookmarking features of the add-on now work normally on Firefox 56.x (GitHub issue #8)

options_changelog_220_list_1.message: New: Select the default folder for "Marquer tous les onglets..." feature (GitHub issue #13)

options_changelog_220_list_2.message: New: Code refactoring and upgrade of internal libraries

options_changelog_220_list_3.message: New: Small wording updates of the add-on options

options_changelog_220_list_4.message: Fix: Hide quick bookmark icon automatically if option is enabled and then disabled

options_changelog_220_list_5.message: Fix: Consistency of the quick bookmark shortcut behavior

options_changelog_220_list_6.message: Fix: Avast add-on reputation - fixed internally by Avast (GitHub issue #14)

options_changelog_221_list_1.message: New: Add support for Firefox Reader Mode - requires version 58 or later (GitHub issue #22)

options_changelog_221_list_2.message: Fix: Quick bookmarking of local files

options_ff_built_in_note.message: Those settings only apply to the built-in bookmarking system of Firefox. They allow you to select in which folder (and in which position of this folder) the new bookmarks will be added. It only affect bookmarks added through the built-in Firefox bookmark icon or shortcut (Ctrl+D), or through the context menu.

options_ff_built_in_folder.message: Select where new bookmarks will be added:

options_ff_built_in_folder_default.message: No folder selected (use Firefox's default bookmark location)

options_ff_built_in_folder_help_1.message: Note: Firefox's default bookmark location is

options_ff_built_in_folder_top.message: Add new bookmarks to the top of the selected folder

options_ff_built_in_folder_top_help.message: If disabled, new bookmarks will be added to the bottom of the selected folder

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs_note.message: The setting below only applies when using the "Marquer tous les onglets..." feature of Firefox. It allows you to override the default location of the newly created folder, which contains itself one bookmark for each of the open tabs.

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs.message: Select where new "Marquer tous les onglets..." folders will be added:

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs_defa.message: No folder selected (use Firefox's default bookmark location)

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs_help.message: Note: Firefox's default "Marquer tous les onglets..." folder location is

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs_top.message: Add new "Marquer tous les onglets..." folders to the top of the selected folder

options_ff_built_in_folder_all_tabs_top_.message: If disabled, new folders will be added to the bottom of the selected folder

options_icon_explanation.message: This feature will add a quick bookmark icon in the address bar, to (un)bookmark a page with only one click. The icon is a round star icon in the address bar. If the current page is bookmarked, the icon color will change to the selected color (red by default). Here are two screenshots to serve as examples: when the current page is not bookmarked and when it is.

options_icon_note.message: The settings below only apply to the quick bookmark icon and shortcut.

options_icon_folder.message: Select where new bookmarks will be added:

options_icon_folder_default.message: No folder selected (use Firefox's default bookmark location)

options_icon_folder_help_1.message: Note: Firefox's default bookmark location is

options_icon_top.message: Add new bookmarks to the top of the selected folder

options_icon_top_help.message: If disabled, new bookmarks will be added to the bottom of the selected folder

options_icon_inbox.message: Only show page as bookmarked if the bookmark is in the folder selected above

options_icon_inbox_help.message: If this setting is enabled, the quick bookmark icon will be colored (i.e. the current page has been bookmarked) only if the bookmark is located in the folder you have selected above

options_icon_color.message: Select the icon color when the current page is bookmarked:

options_icon_color_default.message: By default, the icon color is red when the current page is bookmarked.

options_please_review_1.message: If you enjoy the add-on, please give it a positive
